commit.message:
libgfortran.h (itoa): Rename to gfc_itoa.

	* libgfortran.h (itoa): Rename to gfc_itoa.
	* io/write.c (itoa): Same.
	* runtime/environ.c (itoa): Same.
	* runtime/error.c (itoa): Same.

From-SVN: r92380
